com.engine.resources

Class CoreFont

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.engine.resources.CoreFont

  • public class CoreFont
extends java.lang.Object

    CoreFont

    To use a custom font with a project it must be registered as a CoreFont. To register a font, do so through the registerFont() method in ResourceLoader.

    Author:
    Ryan Hochmuth

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CoreFont(java.lang.String fontPath, java.lang.String fontName, int fontSize, java.awt.Font font, boolean isBold)
      Create a new CoreFont using the Font at the fontPath as the Font to register.
